name: Cheez Wiz Inn (connieksun)
description:
Cheez Wiz Inn is a 3D business management game. Play as a wizard who recently moved into town to start your lifelong dream: running a world-famous cheese tavern. Serve fantasy customers cheese and ale, and save up enough money to purchase décor for your shop to improve your renown. Careful, though! You owe a hefty sum to Tim Cook, so pay him off in time to avoid being foreclosed. Gouda luck! 🧀

Acknowledgements

Developers: Kaiden, Connie, Cat, and Ralph

Made for ISTA 451/INFO 551, Fall 2022, The University of Arizona, taught by Drew Castalia
